r.s: PHP Bindings for Chromium Compact Language Detector
r.d: Exposes Chromium Compact Language Detector to PHP to find out what language a text is
r.n: - Fixing linking on Linux causing the error "undefined symbol _ZNSs4_Rep20_S_empty_rep_storageE" - Reflection test case for CLD\InvalidArgumentException, CLD\InvalidLanguageException, CLD\InvalidEncodingException - Reflection test case for CLD\Detector - Use cld_encodings.h from upstream library instead of our own
